title: Anyone up?
body: So people are getting banned for no reason on this game, maybe riot really doesn't care about us, the players so they just put an automatic system to ban and it makes a lot of mistakes. I wanted to ask you if anyone wants the automated banning system removed and changed with something else or fixed? Riot has gone too far with banning people randomly, that system is making a thousand mistakes.

replies.body:
The false positive rate of the IFS punishments is very low. It does happen of course, but very rarely, and when it does it's pretty much fixed within a couple days via support.

If you have a specific example you want to discuss then you'll have to give a bit more context.
